import { useState, useContext, Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' const moment = require('moment') import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Facebook, Twitter, Mail, GitHub, Edit2 } from 'react-feather' import InputPasswordToggle from '@components/input-password-toggle' import {Col, Row, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardText, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, CustomInput, Button, UncontrolledTooltip } from 'reactstrap' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import classnames from 'classnames' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { add_Contractor, update_Contractor } from '@store/actions/hr/contractor/contractor' import axios from 'axios' import '@styles/base/pages/page-auth.scss' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper' import Table from '@material-ui/core/Table' import TableBody from '@material-ui/core/TableBody' import TableCell from '@material-ui/core/TableCell' import TableContainer from '@material-ui/core/TableContainer' import TableHead from '@material-ui/core/TableHead' import TablePagination from '@material-ui/core/TablePagination' import TableRow from '@material-ui/core/TableRow' const loginAuthID = sessionStorage.getItem('id_token') const columns = [ { id: 'index', label: 'Sr. no.', minWidth: 80 }, { id: 'organizations_id', label: 'Organizations id', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'contractors_name', label: 'Contractors name', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'pan', label: 'Pan', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'pan_url', label: 'Pan url', minWidth: 170, align: minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'micr', label: 'Micr', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'contract_end_date', label: 'Contract end date', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'pf_registration_number', label: 'Pf registration number', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, 'Labour license url', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'action', label: 'ACTION', minWidth: 100 } ] const useStyles = makeStyles({ root: { width: '100%' }, container: { maxHeight: 440 } }) const MasterForm = (props) => { const { register, errors, setValue, handleSubmit } = useForm({defaultValues:props ? props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail : "", shouldUnregister: false}) const [userlist, setUserList] = useState([]) const [organizationlist, setOrganizationList] = useState([]) const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { setValue("contract_start_date", moment(props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail.contract_start_date).format("YYYY-MM-DD")) setValue("contract_end_date", moment(props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail.contract_end_date).format("YYYY-MM-DD")) }) const userList = 'http://172.105.49.15:3030/api/user/get_user_list' useEffect(() => { axios.get(userList) .then(r => setUserList(r)) }, [userList]) const organization = 'http://172.105.49.15:3030/api/master/list_organization' useEffect(() => { axios.get(organization) .then(r => setOrganizationList(r)) }, [organization]) //HANDLE SUBMIT const onSubmit = data => { console.log(data) if (props && props.preloadValue) { dispatch(update_Contractor(data, props)) } else { dispatch(add_Contractor(data, props)) } } console.log(props) return (
onSubmit(data))} > value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter your organizations' autoFocus > {organizationlist && organizationlist.data && organizationlist.data.data && organizationlist.data.data.map((org, index) => { return ( ) })} {errors.organizations_id && errors.organizations_id.type === 'required' &&

) } const Contractor = (props) => { const [addform, setAddForm] = useState(false) const [updateuser, setUpdateuser] = useState(false) const [addbutton, setAddButton] = useState(false) const [userdetail, setUserDetail] = useState([]) const [user, setUser] = useState([]) const classes = useStyles() const [page, setPage] = useState(0) const [rowsPerPage, setRowsPerPage] = useState(10) const [searching, setSearchStream] = useState('') const handleChangePage = (event, newPage) => { setPage(newPage) } const handleChangeRowsPerPage = (event) => { setRowsPerPage(+event.target.value) setPage(0) } ///search table data const searchChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const searchstream = e.target.value // setSearchStream(searchstream) // const searchString = searching if (searchstream.length > 3) { const newstring = new RegExp(searchstream) const searchitem = userdetail && userdetail.data && userdetail.data.data && userdetail.data.data.filter(item => { // console.log(item.name, searchstream, item.text.match(newstring)) return item.contractors_name.match(newstring) || item.type.match(newstring) || item.pan.match(newstring) || item.gst.match(newstring) || item.address.match(newstring) || item.bank_name.match(newstring) || item.micr.match(newstring) || item.pf_registration_number.match(newstring) || item.esi_registration_number.match(newstring) || item.profession_tax_registration_no.match(newstring) || item.organizations_id.location_name.match(newstring) || item.branch.match(newstring) || moment(item.contract_start_date).format("dd-mm-yyy").match(searchstream) || moment(item.contract_end_date).format("dd-mm-yyy").match(searchstream) || item.contract_type.match(newstring) || item.compliances.match(newstring) || item.mlwf_registration_no.match(newstring) || item.total_number_of_labourer.toString().match(newstring) }) console.log(searchitem) setUserDetail({data:{data:searchitem}}) } else { setUserDetail(user) } } const onAddClick = () => { setAddForm(true) setAddButton(true) setUpdateuser(false) } const onCancleClick = () => { setAddForm(false) setAddButton(false) } const onEditClick = (detail) => { props.history.push({ state : { detail }}) setUpdateuser(true) setAddForm(false) } const userdetailapi = 'http://172.105.49.15:3030/web/list_contractor' useEffect(() => { axios.get(userdetailapi, { headers:{ token:loginAuthID }}) .then(r => { setUser(r) setUserDetail(r) } ) }, [addform, updateuser]) useEffect(() => { const {location, history} = props //use the state via location.state //and replace the state via history.replace() }, [history]) console.log(userdetail) return (
{ addform === true ? Contractor {/* Please Register for master */} { setAddForm(false) }} /> : " "} {updateuser === true ? Contractor {/* Please Register for master */} { setUpdateuser(false) }} /> : "" }

searchChange(e)} // className={classnames({ 'is-invalid': errors['image'] })} // innerRef={register({ required: true, validate: value => value !== '' })} placeholder='search...' autoFocus /> {addbutton === false ? Add Contractor Detail : Add Contractor Detail } {columns.map((column) => ( {column.label} ))} {userdetail && userdetail.data && userdetail.data.data && userdetail.data.data.slice((page * rowsPerPage), (page * rowsPerPage) + rowsPerPage).map((detail, index) => { console.log(detail) return ( {index + 1 } {detail.organizations_id === null ? 'not found' : detail.organizations_id.location_name} {detail.contractors_name} {detail.pan} {detail.pan_url} {detail.gst} {detail.gst_url} {detail.type} {detail.address} {detail.cancelled_check_url} {detail.bank_name} {detail.account_name} {detail.ifsc_code} {detail.micr} {detail.branch} {moment(detail.contract_start_date).format("DD-MM-YYYY")} {moment(detail.contract_end_date).format("DD-MM-YYYY")} {detail.contract_type} {detail.compliances} {detail.pf_registration_number} {detail.pf_registration_number_url} {detail.esi_registration_number} {detail.esi_registration_number_url} {detail.profession_tax_registration_no} {detail.profession_tax_registration_no_url} {detail.mlwf_registration_no} {detail.agreement_copy_url} {detail.total_number_of_labourer} {detail.form_5_url} {detail.labour_rc_url} {detail.labour_license_url} onEditClick(detail)} outline id={`positionTop_${index + 1}`}> Edit ) })}
) } export default Contractor
